item.title: Police opening investigation after boat fire at Twin Dolphin Marina
item.description: The Bradenton Police Department said reports of a fire next to Green Bridge were received around 1:30 p.m. on Monday

item.title: Coast Guard airlifts man off Sanibel Island
item.description: Coast Guard airlifts man off Sanibel Island

item.title: I-75 off-ramp closure might delay traffic
item.description: Drivers may be delayed seeking alternate for I-75 ramp closure.

item.title: Manatee County wants public input on future of planned Cortez boat ramp
item.description: Cortez Boat Ramp location expected to be north of Cortez Bridge

item.title: WATCH: Coast Guard airlifts fisherman from boat 130 miles off Sanibel
item.description: The owner of the Honey Bee, a commercial fishing vessel, reported the captain was experiencing a medical emergency.

item.title: Flesh eating bacteria kills 4 people in Florida so far in 2025
item.description: The FDOH is reporting that four people in Florida have died so far in 2025.

item.title: Florida ranks No. 1 in group’s rankings for religious freedom
item.description: The “Religious Liberty in the States 2025” report ranked Florida first, followed by Montana and Illinois.

item.title: Report: Rays sale to Jacksonville investors could be final by September
item.description: The team had been trying to find a deal for a new stadium, either in St. Petersburg or in Tampa.

item.title: Operation Warrior Resolution celebrating new facility
item.description: A new retreat center sits on six acres.

item.title: Manatee County hosting drive-in sandbag pickup event
item.description: This drive-thru filling and pickup event is Friday, July 18, from 10 a.m. to 7 p.m.

item.title: Salesman charged with battery after allegedly pushing potential customer
item.description: The homeowner said she told the salesman she was not interested and to leave multiple times.

item.title: Another First Alert Weather Day as a low-pressure area brings heavy rain
